Definition at line 110 of file change_history.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
                        
                        $Record = $this->Security->get( $Record , 'string' );
                        
                        $ObjectType = $this->Link->get_link_type( 'history' , $ObjectType );
                        $User = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_user();
                        $Author = get_field( $User , 'id' );
                        
                        foreach( $Record as $FieldName => $FieldValue )
                        {
                              $this->Database->insert( $this->NativeTable , 
                                    'object_id , object_type , field_name , field_value , creation_date , author' , 
                                    "$id , $ObjectType , '$FieldName' , '$FieldValue' , NOW() , $Author"
                              );
                              
                              $this->Database->commit();
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )

get_grid_lines ( &$  Changes  )

$Changes - Changes.

Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 249 of file change_history.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Lines = array();
                        
                        $Previous = array();
                        
                        foreach( $Changes as $i => $Change )
                        {
                              $Time = strtotime( get_field( $Change , 'creation_date' ) );
                              $Class = 'table_row_'.( $i % 2 ? 'even' : 'odd' );

                              $Code  = '<tr class="grid_row"><td class="'.$Class.'">'.date( 'd.m.y' , $Time ).'</td>';
                              $Code .= '<td class="'.$Class.'">'.date( 'H:i:s' , $Time ).'</td>';
                              $Code .= '<td class="'.$Class.'">'.get_field( $Change , 'author_name' ).'</td>';
                              
                              $FieldName = get_field( $Change , 'field_name' );
                              $Code .= "<td class=\"$Class\">$FieldName</td>";
                              $Code .= '<td class="'.$Class.'">'.get_field( $Previous , $FieldName , '-' ).'</td>';
                              
                              $FieldValue = get_field( $Change , 'field_value' );
                              $Code .= "<td class=\"$Class\">$FieldValue</td>";
                              $Previous[ $FieldName ] = $FieldValue;
                              
                              $Lines [] = $Code;
                        }
                        
                        return( implode( '' , array_reverse( $Lines ) ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 164 of file change_history.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
                        $ObjectType = $this->Link->get_link_type( 'history' , $ObjectType );
                        
                        $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
                        
                        return( 
                              $this->Database->select( 
                                    $this->NativeTable.'.* , umx_user.login AS author_name' , 
                                    $this->NativeTable.' , umx_user' , 
                                    $this->NativeTable.".author = umx_user.id AND ".
                                    $this->NativeTable.".object_id = $id AND ".
                                    $this->NativeTable.".object_type = $ObjectType
                                    ORDER BY id ASC"
                              )
                        );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
